name: Firefox style lightbox for images
description:
For pages that are just an image, this style centers the image on the middle of the page with a dark background. Supports transparent images.

This replicates a feature in Firefox for other browsers.
additional_info:
Version 1.1.1 Shamelessly cribbed directly from Firefox's own CSS. Example URLs: (since Userstyles won't allow images)
